name: BitStream Studios
body:
![](images/logo.png) 
# Welcome to BitStream Studios
Here you can find information about us, as well as our products.

## About Us
BitStream Studios was founded in April 17th 2010 with a very simple idea in mind, to create. Our products are based on our needs and are always designed to be simple and effective.

## Products

### Boost Starter Kit - Your typical roll-a-ball on steroids
![](images/boost.png) 
[Buy Here](http://assetstore.unity3d.com/)
